text:
You mount the dais. A sensation of dizziness overwhelms you. The cavern spins away into the darkness, and for a moment you are hurtling -- or drifting -- through a place of unreal colours and unheard-of melodies.

You are relieved a moment later to find your feet on solid ground again. The swirling lights fade away, revealing that you have been teleported to one end of a very long corridor.

You have no idea where in the Battlepits you now stand, but that is the least of your worries. You are surrounded by four NIGHT ELVES -- tall, slim beings with eerie sorcery at their fingertips. They are ready to fight you.
